description.value:
When you learn this ability, the following Mantras are added to your list of available Mantras to choose from.  However, these Mantras can only be associated with your Number of the Dragon.  

In addition, when this is unlocked, you can swap out 1 Mantra you know for another one.  

  • Suffer No Insult: Until the end of your next turn, attackers that hit you with melee attacks suffer 1d4 damage of your Elemental Affinity's type.
  • Mine, All Mine: Coins with a total gp value equal to your proficiency bonus appear in a container you're carrying.
